text: Kꞌa te riꞌ, ri Jesús xubꞌij che: Qas chatatabꞌej we riꞌ, man katzijoj ta chi che jun winaq chik ri xkꞌulmatajik. Xaq xwi jat jawjeꞌ ri kꞌo wi ri chꞌawenel pa kiwiꞌ ri winaq, chakꞌama bꞌik ri sipanik ri xtaqan ri Moisés chubꞌanik, rech kakil ri e chꞌawenelabꞌ pa kiwiꞌ ri winaq chi xatutzir che ri yabꞌil.
